title: Thermalwear for tado째
summary: Control your tado째 thermostat from your android wear smartwatch!
description: The first android wear app to control your tado째 thermostat. Currently supports:- See the current status.- See the current users presence.- Set target temperatures for: home, sleep, manual modes (the set points can only be set if you are currently in that mode and you only have one "Home" or "Sleep" temperature).- Switch tado째 mode to: auto, manual, off.You need to set your presence detection settings so that other residents can see your presence and absence in order to see the thermostat status.Feedback welcomed.
descriptionHTML:
The first android wear app to control your tado° thermostat. Currently supports:

- See the current status.
- See the current users presence.
- Set target temperatures for: home, sleep, manual modes (the set points can only be set if you are currently in that mode and you only have one "Home" or "Sleep" temperature).
- Switch tado° mode to: auto, manual, off.

You need to set your presence detection settings so that other residents can see your presence and absence in order to see the thermostat status.

Feedback welcomed.
comments: Unable to get this to appear on my watch. It's also not available in the Google Play store on the watch itself.  I assume this isn't compatible with Android Wear 2.0?
Control your heating from you watch Works perfectly :)
Excellent It's like being in the Jetsons
Really nice app Just one problem - I don't seem to be able to change the target temperature when in auto mode. Works fine when in manual. Other than that, a really nice app and works well.
Love it Fantastic app. Very handy to be able to control tado on your wrist!
recentChanges: - Fix for updating home and sleep temperatures (It's only available if you have only one temperature for each of these modes, otherwise the controls will be disabled)
Please report your issues to thermalwear@adrova.com
